short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery......
description:
AMENDMENTTO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 15 2023 at 14:00EST. All bids submitted after 14:00EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. \r
H2 Purifier\r
National Research Council (NRC) has a requirement for the supply of a H2 Purifier. Delivery to Ottawa, ON must be on or before March 25, 2024. Interested suppliers must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Annex A – Requirement of the Request for Proposal. \r
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the request for proposals process. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days of receipt of the results of the request for proposals process. The debriefing may be in writing, by telephone or in person.\r
This PSPC office provides procurement services to the public in both official languages.\r
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.\r
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
